## Content

- Metropolis-adjusted Langevin algorithm (MALA)
- Gibbs sampling
- Data augmentation


## Learning objectives

At the end of the chapter, students should be able to

- implement Gibbs sampling
- derive the conditional distributions of a model for Gibbs sampling



## Readings


- Chapters  [5](https://lbelzile.github.io/MATH80601A/mcmc.html) and [6](https://lbelzile.github.io/MATH80601A/gibbs.html) of the course notes


## Complementary readings


- @Albert:2009, chapters 6 and 10 (several examples)
- @McElreath:2020, chapter 9 (non technical)
- @Neal:2003 (slice sampling)
